alert.note: Alert for Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:50AM CST until January 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory tonight into Wednesday morning, very cold wind chills expected as low as zero. * WHERE...Randolph County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
